name: Student Visa
longDesc: Comprehensive student visa assistance for international students. We guide you through the entire process from document preparation to visa approval, ensuring your study abroad dreams become reality.

faqs.q: How long does the student visa process take?
faqs.a: Processing times vary by country: USA (2-4 weeks), Canada (4-8 weeks), UK (3-6 weeks), Australia (2-4 weeks).
Bank statements, scholarship letters, sponsor letters, and proof of sufficient funds for tuition and living expenses.

name: Work Visa
longDesc: Expert guidance for work visa applications including job search assistance, employer sponsorship, and work permit processing for skilled professionals.

faqs.q: Do I need a job offer before applying?
faqs.a: Yes, most work visas require a valid job offer and employer sponsorship.

faqs.q: What is the success rate for work visas?
faqs.a: Our success rate is 95% for qualified candidates with proper documentation.

name: Tourist Visa
shortDesc: Quick and easy tourist visa processing
longDesc: Fast-track tourist visa applications for leisure travel, family visits, and short-term stays in your dream destinations.

faqs.q: How quickly can I get a tourist visa?
faqs.a: Most tourist visas can be processed within 7-15 business days.
Passport, photographs, travel itinerary, financial documents, and accommodation proof.

name: Family Visa
shortDesc: Reunite with your loved ones abroad
longDesc: Comprehensive family visa services for spouses, children, and dependent family members to reunite with their families overseas.

faqs.q: What proof of relationship is required?
faqs.a: Marriage certificates, birth certificates, and other official documents proving family relationships.

faqs.q: Can I include my children in the application?
faqs.a: Yes, dependent children under 21 can typically be included in family visa applications.

name: Business Visa
longDesc: Specialized services for business travelers, investors, and entrepreneurs seeking international opportunities and business expansion.

faqs.q: What is the minimum investment required?
faqs.a: Investment requirements vary by country, typically ranging from $50,000 to $500,000.

faqs.q: Can I work with a business visa?
faqs.a: Business visas typically allow business activities but may have restrictions on employment.

name: Immigration Consultation
longDesc: Comprehensive immigration consultation services including pathway planning, document review, and strategic guidance for your immigration journey.

faqs.a: Initial assessment, pathway recommendations, document checklist, and strategic planning session.

faqs.q: How long is the consultation valid?
faqs.a: Our recommendations and guidance remain valid for 6 months from the consultation date.
